title: HOLY Void Gate!!!
body:
This thing will be nerved no doubt....

It produces a minion every 4 seconds for 150 seconds.....

They damage enemy minions and give you gold and damage towers.... What's preventing a team from buying 1 per person and setting them all bot lane while 1 split pushes top and 4 siege mid.. Basically you have an item split pushing bot while a champ splits top.... HOLY CRAP!!!!
